examples.example: 早上喝一杯牛奶，让我一整天都充满了活力。

translate.english: Drinking a glass of milk in the morning makes me full of energy for the whole day.

examples.example: 我每天晚上都会喝一杯牛奶，然后甜甜地进入梦乡。

translate.english: I drink a glass of milk every night and then fall asleep sweetly.

examples.example: 妈妈总是提醒我要多喝牛奶，这样身体才能更健康。

translate.english: Mother always reminds me to drink more milk, so that the body can be healthier.
